## Welcome

I am a **PhD in Marine Sciences** specialized in **ocean biogeochemistry**, with particular emphasis on the study of the carbon system, ocean acidification, and their implications for global climate change.

I am currently a **Research Scientist** at the [Institute of Marine Sciences of Andalusia (ICMAN-CSIC)](https://www.icman.csic.es/) in Cádiz, Spain, where I develop my research within the competitive **MOMENTUM** program.

### Research Areas

::: {.grid}

::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6}
**Carbon System & GHG**

- Ocean-atmosphere CO₂ fluxes
- Greenhouse gas dynamics (CO₂, CH₄, N₂O)
- Biogeochemical carbon cycle
- Ocean acidification
:::

::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6}
**Technology & Innovation**

- Artificial Intelligence applications
- Oceanographic Big Data processing
- Biogeochemical modeling
- Long-term time series analysis
:::

:::

### Highlights

- **26 articles** in high-impact international journals
- **H-index: 16** (Google Scholar)
- Experience in oceanographic expeditions in the **Mediterranean and Baltic Seas, Atlantic and Southern Oceans**
- Principal Investigator in competitive national and international projects
- International collaborations with institutions from **Europe, America, Asia, and Africa**
